A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was a slap in the face to Star Wars fans. Disney had so much potential with the series following TFO and plenty of source material inherited from the extended universe but elected to troll us all with lame humour\, numerous plotholes and total lack of depth. I hope it isn't the final nail for the franchise but it will be hard to redeem. Good luck for ep 9 JJ.
